== Pathur (627059) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Pathur is a village in the [[Kasaragod]] taluka of [[Kasaragod]] district with an area of 1044 hectares and harbouring 1054 households with total population of 6383 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Kasaragod]] is at a distance of 38 km. Male population is 3118 and female population is 3265. Scheduled Caste Population is 138 and Scheduled Tribes population is 62. Census Location Code of the village is 627059<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 4839 (75.81%)
* Literate male population: 2551 (81.82%)
* Literate female population: 2288 (70.08%)
